body.name: Hoctieon 6 Tier Tree Bookshelf, 6 Shelf Bookcase with Drawer, Modern Book Storage, Free Standing Tree Bookcase, Utility Organizer Shelves for Home Office, Living Room, Bedroom, Rustic Brown

features: 【Multifunctional & Multi-Scene】The rustic tree bookcase is an old-time classic with a charming vintage look and functional design. This home bookshelf is a perfect combination of hardened steel and relic particle board that will match perfectly with any other furniture in your home. This bookshelf is not only a beautiful work of art, but also a practical organizer for your home office, living room, and bedroom.

【Space Saving & Large Capacity】 This bookshelf is very compact comes with 6 open shelves, perfect for storing books, potted plants, CDs, magazines, videos, photo albums, crafts or other favorite collections. There is also a bottom drawer that not only provides great stability and durability, but also provides a safe, healthy and large storage space for your family bedroom.

【Safe & Sturdy】Not only does this bookshelf provide great stability and durability, there are brackets on the wall to secure the bookshelf to the wall, which greatly improves the safety and stability of the bookshelf and is 100% safe for families with children and pets.

【Easy to maintain & Easy to clean】It is perfect for decorating, organizing and storing your items while keeping them neat and organized in your living room. The shelves can be easily cleaned with a wet rag.
【Easy to Assemble & Easy to Disassemble】The package comes with clear and detailed instructions, as well as numbered assembly parts to ensure you can assemble easily.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can't find the book you want? This bookshelf features a branch-shaped open-and-display design that allows you to find a book from a pile. The drawer on the base provides extra space for small items that can easily get lost and some personal items, which is very thoughtful and convenient.

A Good Balance of Artistry&Practicality Hoctieon 6 Tier Tree Bookshelf for Small Spaces Stylish and elegant in design, the Hoctieon Tree Bookshelf can be used to organize and store books or decorative items, providing extra storage space and reducing clutter. It can enhance the overall look of a home, adding texture, depth, and dimension to a room. 1. Product Weight: 15.65 lb 2. Tiers: 6 Tiers 3. Need to install: Provide the installation tool. 4. Material: 100% High-quality engineered wood.

The Details Show: Anti-Falling Accessory Equipped with anti-drop accessories to further enhance the stability of the bookshelf. For the sake of safety, please use the anti-toppling device to fix the product on the wall. Waterproof & Easy to Clean Dust can be easily wiped clean with a rag, with a certain waterproof function. The dust and stains on the bookshelf can be easily wiped clean with a rag, and the bookshelf has a certain waterproof function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Utilize Video Intstructions
reviews.reviewText: The bookshelf as a whole is a steal for the price, when it comes to Amazon purchases, you really do get what you pay for. Assembly wasn't very difficult, however, the instructions that come with the package can become very confusing. I did have to un-assemble some of the pieces a few times because of them needed to be moved or turned around.Besides the confusing instructions (that also very well could have been operator error)It is a great bookshelf, very sturdy, holds a fair number of books (not adequate for readers looking for large amounts of storage on one shelf).Very cute! I will most likely be purchasing a few other finishes for other rooms in our house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Bought this book shelf for my kids books and it fits perfectly in the area that I wanted to put it in. It also matches the color scheme of my home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to put together
reviews.reviewText: It was overall easy to put together however the screw they provide sucks! My fingers hurt so bad from twisting over and over again. That’s the only bad thing about this bookshelf. It’s cute, sturdy, directions is easy to follow. I didn’t attach the screw to the wall, it’s not needed unless you want the extra protection but it’s not going to fall over. Worth the money for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very difficult assembly but once assembled its sturdy and nice. Worth the price and time if you’re willing to sit and figure out how to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took about an hour to build
reviews.reviewText: I don't write a lot of reviews but I like this product's assembly. I ordered back in May and finally took time to assemble. ADHD might come to mind. Instructions are pictures. You need an electric drill. It does come with a tool, but there are around 40 long screws, to say my wrist hurts is an understatement. It did not come with a phillips screwdriver and you need one for a half dozen phillips screws. The sturdiness is good, but the height is shorter than I thought. It would be really cute for a kid shelf. The shelf comes with wall screw to teether so kids don't pull it on to themselves. Overall only took about an hour of actual assembling, I may have put a few pieces backwards and had to redo. And if I knew where a drill was probably could have cut the time in half. And for being months in a box, the letter stickers came off fairly well although a little more effort went into removing the product label sticker. Overall even with the few blips still a nice shelf for my cookbooks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Relatively easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This fits perfectly in a little corner in my room and looks exactly as pictured. I love it. Took about 45 minutes to assemble which included unboxing and watching the video. Then it was a matter of following the pictures in the manual and aligning the pieces correctly. I had to error correct twice but overall it wasn’t difficult. Ensure that you tighten screws halfway and then as evenly as possible especially if they’re on the same piece or in line with each other. For the small triangular piece (E), it was easier for me to attach it to D first because for some reason that piece did not seem as sturdy as the rest and the base of the triangle was disintegrating from the screws. Still worth 5 stars to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite the puzzle
reviews.reviewText: Quite the puzzle to put together because every piece has to be oriented correctly, sounds simple but the instructions have you build it upside down so it gets a little weird at times. Other than that it looks great and works great, actually pretty sturdy to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It has a small footprint in a room but does a big job
reviews.reviewText: Before buying, I read a lot of reviews and saw that it was repeatedly mentioned how difficult it was to put together or how unhelpful the instructions were. Having put together many pieces of furniture from boxes previously, I didn't think it could be all that bad. I was very wrong! The instructions are hideously lacking, to the point you have to keep taking pieces off and changing their direction. Because of the different angles of this item, you cannot tell a piece is wrong as you're working with it. The manufacturer needs to change this deficiency. I've never seen instructions so poorly done.I would also strongly encourage the manufacturer to provide matching colored screws for where they will be seen, or to sink them lower and include a plastic plug-in cover that matches the color of the bookcase. Having silver screws show definitely takes away from the overall look. I bought the white one, and it will be easy enough to paint the screws that show. Not so with the other colors offered. Lastly, I think there should be easy to remove labels that identify each piece. The ones provided now take some work to get off, and then more work to get the glue off. Removing them too soon isn't advisable because the alphabet letter is needed for assembly, or in most cases RE-assembly after correcting.These things aside, the bookcase is attractive and serves its purpose well. Its unique configuration is very nice.
